chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
Hi!
cool! we're at the start next to the twig
which way should i go?
The twig going across the water south or west?
the twig goes towards the west, what's next?

Okay, go across the twig and keep going a little west and you'll find a tree. Go northwest around the tree and it'll curve around in an almost full circle past an elephant. Keep on the tree until you see big rocks that come after an alligator to the south and follow those across the water
got it, walked past the elephant, around the pesky dudes, the crocodile and across the rocks
now at the frog's island, what now?

From the frog, keep going southeast and you'll cross under his feet and almost hit a tree to the east. When you're about halfway between the two trees, immediately stop and curve west and go straight to the crocodile and cross there
alright, went southeast past the frog, dodged a tree, took a turn west, past the crocodile
now i'm back on the big island with the elephant again. where to next?
Okay, on that island just follow the edge and you'll run into some gray rocks and a giraffe. Go across the rocks to the giraffe, then south and you'll find another twig to cross
got it! went past the rocks and reached the giraffe
handled the twig to the south. what's next?
Go straight east past the snake and you'll find a treasure chest!
done and done! explored past the snake and found the treasure chest *finished*
hey, estas listo?
Hi! I'm here
great! start by moving a few steps left, keeping your eye on that wooden bench and the florist stand
ready? let's go
How far should I go?
keep going till you're under the bench and you can see the trail
but don't go all the way to the florist stand
I can see it. I'm by the trail now
perfect! now do a swift u-turn to your left and cross that trail again
head back towards the white dog
Okay, I'm almost at the dog
ok, now cross over that branch and go south
just keep moving down the map
Okay, I'm across and see a white dog and a picnic

that's it! 
now, go over the mat and be sure to touch the bowl of berries
from there, continue heading west
How far west? I'm on the berries
until you see another wooden branch
you're gonna cross the river there, to the north
I'm across and next to a bridge
sweet! now avoid that green bush
go around it from the right side instead
Okay, I went around it
and guess where you ended up? right by the florist stand! now take a left turn and go below the stand
Okay, I'm by the bike
keep going past the bridge until you spot a couple of elderly people sitting on a bench
say hi!
I'm by the elderly couple. HI!
haha i bet they smiled! now take a few steps south, between those old folks and that other wooden branch
Okay, I'm by the branch and see trees and a deer
awesome! now go east, squeezing between that branch and a green bush
Okay, that put me by the deer
congratulations! you've reached our final spot
say hi to the deer!
hola, q tal? ready to play?
I am!
great! alright, i'm at the tent up north
where to next, friend?

From the tent, go straight south until you see a bush, but curve around it to the west. You'll hit a road. Follow that east until you see a fire on the left and leave the path to curve around that fire to the east and back to the path again. Follow it until you get to a blue car you'll see straight ahead
aye aye, captain! passed the bush, followed the road, dodged the fire, and now I'm at the blue car
what's next on the list?

From the car go west down the path again and this time take the south fork in the road. Stay on the road going south until you see a telescope up ahead. You'll see a bush to the east of that. Go between them and to the next piece of road to the south
followed your instructions and now i've arrived at the telescope
which direction now?

From the south of the telescope you're going to go west along the road a little. Look off to the north and you'll see a sort of ledge you're following. As soon as that turns into more of a circular raised area, you're going to climb up the corner to the north and you'll find a log cabin at the top!
followed the ledge, did some mountain goat stuff and surprise! made it to the cabin
we did it, buddy! *finished*
hi there! que comience el juego!!
I'm ready!
awesome! now look out, you're by three palm trees, right? head southwest under the first tree, swing to the right past the second one, then take a sharp left before you hit the third
keep going south. you got it!
Okay, I'm between number 2 and 3
super! now hitch a left when you see a cute brown puppy
take a slight left, and then swerve right heading south. got it, pal?
I went down below the puppy right in front of it
you're doing great! now keep your eyes open for a big rock and a small rock
you're going to walk right between them. the ocean is straight ahead!
I'm between the rocks and in front of a crab now
excellent! time to make some waves
now turn right, following the big rock towards the west. just keep swimming!
I swam past the big rock. How far do I go?
until you see a medium rock
as you go past it, it's time for a quick right turn!
I turned right just before the shark and after the medium rock. I'm now at a volleyball
perfect, now head back to the land
I'm on the land
sweet! now slide between the medium rock and that tri-color ball, then head north
you're smashing this!
I squeezed past them. How far north?
until you spot a red tent and a big speaker
head there!
I'm there now!
brilliant! now, see a little to the left and go northwest, crossing between the red tent and the larger speaker
I'm in the middle of them now
you're a champion! now circle around the tent
looks like an arc, yeah?
I'm now at the bottom left corner of the tent
so far, so good
now head south but stop before you reach the water
I'm almost to the water to the south
perfect! now, do a sharp right and stroll west under a red kayak
keep going, buddy!
I'm under the red kayak
awesome! tv-turn now, head north along the kayak
I'm at the top of it now
perfect! now just a tiny bit more - go north to that small green bush
great job mate!

general_survey.answer: I was afraid I wouldn't understand what to do, but it was simple!
general_survey.question: Any final comments about your partner’s language switching?

general_survey.answer: I'm unsure what else to add... I'm still learning Spanish, though!
